meaningMnemonic: All the extra things in your <kanji>head</kanji> <kanji>die</kanji> when you <vocabulary>immerse yourself</vocabulary> in one thing. That way the one thing you're focusing on is the only thing your brain hears.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You've learned them both already, so you should be able to read this word.
